name: MIS National Visitors Restrictions
description: v1.0 This is an report returns all visitors who have an open visits restriction of type Banned, Closed or Non Contact. The details of the prisoner(s) to whom they are associated as shown along with each prisoner's establishment. The report will automatically return data for the establishments to which you have been given access.

dataset.name: Visitor Restrictions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.LAST_NAME, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.L_VISITOR_RESTRICT_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.LOCAL_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1)) AND AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.L_VISITOR_RESTRICT_TYPE IN ('BAN', 'CLOSED', 'NONCON') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID > 0) UNION SELECT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.LAST_NAME, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.RESTRICTION_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK) AND (AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK (+) = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND ((AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.VISITOR_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1)) AND AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.RESTRICTION_TYPE IN ('BAN', 'CLOSED', 'NONCON') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID > 0)), dataset_ AS (SELECT VISITOR_PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, L_VISITOR_RESTRICT_TYPE, SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
